news.title: 美副总统称欧洲盟友在格陵兰问题上对美让步更多
news.title0: Europeans don't admit Greenland concessions, JD Vance says
news.content: 美国副总统万斯称，欧洲盟友在格陵兰问题上对美国的让步比公开承认的要多，暗示美方已获得比最初更多的利益。
news.content0: European allies of the US have made more concessions to the US over Greenland than they publicly admit, Vice-President JD Vance has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大歌手为美国奥运队宣传遭本国网民抨击
news.title0: Canadian  singer Tate McRae faces backlash for promoting Team USA
news.content: 加拿大流行歌手泰特·麦克雷因在宣传视频中为美国奥运队助威而引发本国网民强烈不满，被批“背叛”。
news.content0: Canadian pop star Tate McRae is facing backlash after appearing in a promotional video for Team USA ahead of the Milano-Cortina Winter Olympics 2026.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 日本富士山脚下樱花节因游客行为不端被取消
news.title0: Japanese city cancels cherry blossom festival over badly behaved tourists
news.content: 日本富士吉田市因游客激增导致交通拥堵、乱扔垃圾甚至擅闯私宅，决定取消今年的樱花节以保护居民生活环境。
news.content0: Japanese authorities in a town near Mount Fuji have cancelled this year's cherry blossom festival, saying a surge in tourist numbers is unmanageable for locals.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 波多黎各歌手Bad Bunny坦言因超级碗中场秀失眠
news.title0: Bad Bunny says he's losing sleep over the Super Bowl
news.content: 波多黎各说唱歌手Bad Bunny承认，在即将到来的超级碗中场秀表演前压力巨大，甚至凌晨四点醒来思考。
news.content0: Puerto Rican rapper Bad Bunny says he's trying to stay calm ahead of Sunday's Super Bowl, Half Time Show - but it isn't working out.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 索马里一地区罕见对一名谋杀女童的妇女执行死刑
news.title0: Somali woman executed for murdering a child in a case that sparked outrage
news.content: 索马里邦特兰地区一名妇女因谋杀一名14岁女童被判处死刑并已执行，此案在当地引发了对儿童保护的广泛呼吁。
news.content0: The authorities in Puntland, a semi‑autonomous region of Somalia, have executed a woman convicted of murdering a 14‑year‑old girl, in a rare case in the region in which the death penalty has been carried out against a woman.
news.author: BBC

news.title: NHL选秀热门新星被控重罪袭击
news.title0: Top NHL draft prospect Gavin McKenna charged with assault
news.content: 被预测为NHL选秀状元的加拿大冰球新星加文·麦肯纳在美国宾夕法尼亚州被控重罪袭击和骚扰，已获保释。
news.content0: A rising ice hockey star predicted to be the top draft pick for the National Hockey League has been charged with felony assault and harassment by authorities in the US state of Pennsylvania.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 范思哲任命新设计师引品牌风格争议
news.title0: Is Versace’s new designer too brainy for this sexy brand?
news.content: 以性感著称的意大利奢侈品牌范思哲任命皮特·穆利尔为新设计师，外界质疑其“脑力型”风格是否适合该品牌。
news.content0: Here’s an instructive if simplistic way to understand fashion in 2026: there are brainy brands, and there are body brands.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 新AI模型引发华尔街软件股震荡
news.title0: The AI that spooked the stock market just got a big update
news.content: Anthropic公司发布Claude Opus 4.6模型，其AI助手功能引发市场对专业软件被替代的担忧，导致相关股票大跌。
news.content0: Anthropic’s Cowork AI assistantsent shockwaves through Wall Streetthis week. Now Anthropic is taking another leap forward, improving its model.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 研究首次表明类人猿也具有假装游戏能力
news.title0: At a ‘Tea Party’ With Scientists, This Ape Showed Some Imagination
news.content: 科学家研究发现，倭黑猩猩能够进行假装游戏，这表明想象力可能源于人类与类人猿的共同祖先。
news.content0: Having an imaginary friend, playing house or daydreaming about the future were long considered uniquely human abilities. Now, scientists have conducted the first study indicating that apes have the ability to play pretend as well.
news.author: NYTimes
